Topic.Title: Need some help with wearables and verbs.

Posts.EditableText: First of all, I write my game in Russian, so it's the problem since I've already encountered problems like this. Whenever I try to take or look at some wearable object Quest engine says:Error running script: Error compiling expression 'object': Unknown object or variable 'object'. Also if I try to create any verb in Russian it says that it conflicts with the verb "look". Thanks for your help in advance!
